name: Rokto Bondhon
description: A user-friendly Blood Donation Application built with the MERN stack. The platform connects donors with those in need, ensuring a smooth and efficient blood donation process.
challenges: Implementing role-based access control with different permissions.
Managing real-time notifications efficiently for blood donation requests.
Ensuring secure authentication and data protection.
futurePlans: Enhancing the donor search functionality with AI-based recommendations.
Adding multilingual support to make the platform accessible to a wider audience.
Implementing an AI-based chatbot for quick assistance.

name: RaceConnect
description: A comprehensive platform for organizing and managing marathon events. It connects event organizers and participants, allowing streamlined registration, event creation, and dashboard management.
challenges: Handling large datasets for marathon registrations.
futurePlans: Integrating live tracking for marathon participants.
Adding a forum section for runners to share their experiences.
Optimizing the platform for global marathon events.

name: Crowdcube
description: A dynamic crowdfunding platform designed to help individuals, startups, and creative thinkers turn their ideas into reality by connecting them with supporters.
challenges: Ensuring secure and smooth transactions for donations.
Implementing a responsive theme toggle feature.
futurePlans: Introducing social media sharing options for campaigns.
Adding a reward-based system for donors.
Expanding campaign categories for more diverse funding opportunities.
